roleset.name: faulty functioning
roleset.note: MALFUNCTION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-function.01. (from malfunction.01-n)

example.name: malfunction-v
example.text: Investigation of the satellite warning system later confirmed that the system had malfunctioned.

example.name: malfunction-n
example.text: The malfunction of a ventricular shunt is one of the most common clinical problems encountered in pediatric neurosurgery.
